SELECT MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.MS_SI_SALARY_RANK_ID,
MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.MS_SI_SALARY_ID, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.ALLOWANCE0, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.ALLOWANCE1, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.ALLOWANCE2, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.ALLOWANCE3, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.ALLOWANCE4, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.ALLOWANCE5, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.ALLOWANCE6,
MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.USER_KEY, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.DATA_NO, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.SEND_FLAG, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.VESSEL_ID, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.RENEW_DATE, MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.TS,
MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY.NAME MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_NAME, MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY.SHOW_ORDER
FROM MS_SI_SALARY_RANK
INNER JOIN MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY ON MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID = MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID
WHERE MS_SI_SALARY_RANK.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_SI_SALARY_RANK( MS_SI_SALARY_RANK_ID ,
MS_SI_SALARY_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID , ALLOWANCE0 , ALLOWANCE1 , ALLOWANCE2 , ALLOWANCE3 , ALLOWANCE4 , ALLOWANCE5 , ALLOWANCE6 ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( Nextval( 'SEQ_MS_SI_SALARY_RANK_ID' ),
:MS_SI_SALARY_ID, :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID , :ALLOWANCE0 , :ALLOWANCE1 , :ALLOWANCE2 , :ALLOWANCE3 , :ALLOWANCE4 , :ALLOWANCE5 , :ALLOWANCE6 ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_SALARY_RANK SET MS_SI_SALARY_ID = :MS_SI_SALARY_ID , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID , ALLOWANCE0 = :ALLOWANCE0 , ALLOWANCE1 = :ALLOWANCE1 , ALLOWANCE2 = :ALLOWANCE2 , ALLOWANCE3 = :ALLOWANCE3 , ALLOWANCE4 = :ALLOWANCE4 , ALLOWANCE5 = :ALLOWANCE5 , ALLOWANCE6 = :ALLOWANCE6 ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SI_SALARY_RANK_ID = :MS_SI_SALARY_RANK_ID AND TS = :TS
